title: Sin City
description: Sin CIty is the place - tough as leather and dry as tinder. Love is the fuel and "violent" Marv has the match. Watch it burn!Frank Miller - creator of Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Give Me Liberty, Hard Boiled and Elektra Lives Again -produces a modern noir masterpiece in Sin City. Awarded the prestigious National Cartoonists' Award for Best Comic Book of 1992, Sin City  is collected here for the first time.The story is unremittingly hard, tough, unforgiving. The art is to die for. And the dialogue is diamond-hard and razor-sharp... - Comic Buyer's Guide
author: Frank Miller
